To correct an inversion, we can swap adjacent elements.</p>

<p><strong>Example</strong>  </p>

<p><strong>Function Description</strong></p>

<p>Complete the function <em>countInversions</em> in the editor below.   </p>

<p>countInversions has the following parameter(s):</p>

</ul>
